TopicTitle: Crash Upon Entering VAB after returing from flight scene.

Articles.Content:

Crash seems to occur when going into the VAB after flying a craft, but doesn't crash if I go directly in the VAB, from load without going into a flight scene. Doesn't seem to occur every single time, but often enough.

 

I am a bit short on RAM for the mods I'm running, I have increased my page file to help.

 

Logs, two of them, both crashing in the same situations.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/noutbd468n2le16/New folder (4).zip?dl=0
